name: Oathbreaker
description: Oathkeepers who have betrayed their sacred vows, corrupting their divine power for selfish or malevolent purposes and channeling dark energies that mirror their fallen state.

resource_systems.name: Mana
resource_systems.description: Corrupted divine energy that powers unholy spells and abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: 3 per 6 seconds, +5 when inflicting pain or suffering
mechanics: Mana points are spent to cast unholy spells and channel dark power
Some abilities require maintaining a connection to dark forces, consuming mana over time
Dark meditation increases mana regeneration rate by 400% but requires remaining stationary
Can channel mana into weapons and armor for unholy enchantments
Presence in desecrated places doubles mana regeneration rate

resource_systems.name: Dark Favor
resource_systems.description: Blessing from dark powers that empowers malevolent actions
resource_systems.regeneration: 3 per hour, additional points gained through breaking oaths and causing suffering
mechanics: Dark Favor can be spent to enhance weapon attacks with unholy power
Can be used to empower curses or corrupting auras
Acts as a resource for powerful dark abilities
Acts of mercy or compassion can result in temporary loss of Dark Favor
Can be extracted from victims to increase personal power

resource_systems.name: Oath Power
resource_systems.description: Manifestation of an Oathbreaker's corrupted vows, twisted into dark energy
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when acting in accordance with dark tenets, decreases when showing mercy
mechanics: Increases by 15 when performing acts of betrayal or cruelty
Decreases by 20 when showing mercy or compassion
At maximum Oath Power, enter a state of unholy exaltation with enhanced abilities
Can be spent to invoke powerful corrupted abilities
Oathbreakers generate additional Oath Power when corrupting others or desecrating holy sites

resource_systems.name: Shadow Essence
resource_systems.description: Manifestation of spiritual corruption that feeds on fear and despair
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when causing fear or breaking sacred things
mechanics: Increases by 10 when causing fear in others
Increases by 20 when corrupting something pure or sacred
Decreases by 5 per hour when not actively spreading corruption
Can be spent to enhance corrupting abilities or create powerful fear effects
At maximum Shadow Essence, the Oathbreaker's presence causes corruption to spread automatically

class_mechanics.name: Corrupted Smite
class_mechanics.description: Channel unholy power through weapon strikes to corrupt and destroy
effects: Divine Smite is transformed into Corrupted Smite, dealing necrotic damage instead of holy damage
Smite damage is doubled against paladins, clerics, and other divine servants
Successful smites corrupt the target, reducing their healing received and holy damage dealt
Each successful smite drains a portion of the target's life force to heal the Oathbreaker
Corrupted energy spreads from smite impacts, corrupting the environment

class_mechanics.name: Touch of Corruption
class_mechanics.description: Channel dark energy that corrupts and degrades rather than heals
effects: Lay on Hands is transformed into Touch of Corruption, causing necrotic damage and disease
Can corrupt healing effects targeting the victim, turning them into damage
Extended contact can permanently corrupt living beings or objects
Can extract life force from victims to heal the Oathbreaker
Touch can desecrate holy sites and objects, turning them to sources of dark power

class_mechanics.name: Aura of Despair
class_mechanics.description: Project an aura of hopelessness and corruption
effects: Enemies within aura suffer penalties to saving throws and attack rolls
Allies within aura gain resistance to holy damage and immunity to turn undead effects
Healing magic is 50% less effective within the aura
Aura slowly corrupts the environment, withering plants and tainting water
Can maintain two different corrupting auras simultaneously

class_mechanics.name: Avatar of Darkness
class_mechanics.description: Transform into a dark avatar of corruption, embodying the broken oath
effects: Physical form becomes infused with shadows and unholy energy
All abilities cost 50% less resources and are 50% more effective
Presence causes mortals to feel dread and despair
Gain shadowy wings that allow flight and can cocoon for protection
Immune to holy damage and turning effects

signature_abilities.name: Oath Violation
signature_abilities.description: Perform an act that fundamentally violates sacred oaths, releasing tremendous dark power
mechanics: Desecrate a holy site or sacred object to release corrupting energy
All enemies within 50 meters take massive necrotic damage
Holy beings must make a Wisdom save or be corrupted, serving you for 1 hour
Create a zone of desecration that lasts for 24 hours
Costs 100 Mana, 10 Dark Favor, and 100 Shadow Essence

signature_abilities.name: Control Undead
signature_abilities.description: Exert absolute control over undead creatures through your corrupted divine power
mechanics: Take control of all undead within 100 meters
Controlled undead gain 50% increased damage and health
Can see through the eyes of controlled undead
Can sacrifice controlled undead to regain resources
Costs 50 Mana, 5 Dark Favor, and 50 Oath Power

signature_abilities.name: Blasphemous Word
signature_abilities.description: Speak a word of absolute corruption that shatters divine connections and sacred bonds
mechanics: All divine spellcasters within 50 meters must make a Wisdom save or lose access to their divine magic for 1 hour
Holy objects within range are corrupted or destroyed
Divine beings take massive damage and must make a Wisdom save or be banished
Creates a wave of corruption that spreads outward, tainting everything it touches
Costs 75 Mana, 7 Dark Favor, and 75 Shadow Essence

skill_trees.name: Path of the Corruptor
key_abilities: Corrupt Divinity: Turn holy energy into corrupted power
Desecration: Permanently corrupt a holy site, turning it into a source of dark power
False Prophet: Appear as a divine servant to deceive and corrupt followers of light

skill_trees.name: Path of the Tyrant
key_abilities: Dominate Will: Break the will of a target, forcing them to serve you
Rule Through Fear: Create an aura of terror that forces obedience
Iron Fist: Crush resistance with overwhelming force and cruelty

skill_trees.name: Path of the Fallen
key_abilities: Embrace Darkness: Transform into a being of pure shadow and corruption
Soul Drain: Extract the soul essence from victims to empower yourself
Void Pact: Form a pact with entities from beyond reality for greater power

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in any Oathkeeper skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Evil alignment for at least 10 levels

legendary_items.name: Oathbreaker's Edge
effects: Corrupted Smite damage increased by 50%
Weapon drains the life force of those it strikes
Can sever divine connections with a successful critical hit

legendary_items.name: Armor of the Fallen
effects: Reduces holy damage taken by 75%
Automatically corrupts divine magic that targets you
Avatar of Darkness transformation duration increased by 1 minute

legendary_items.name: Crown of Corruption
effects: Intelligence increased by 5
Aura of Despair radius increased by 20 meters
Blasphemous Word cooldown reduced by 12 hours

lore: Oathbreakers represent the darkest path an Oathkeeper can take, having betrayed their sacred vows and corrupted their divine connection for selfish or malevolent purposes. The very power that once made them champions of light and justice now fuels their capacity for corruption and domination. The transformation into an Oathbreaker is not merely a fall from grace but a deliberate inversion of everything the paladin once stood for, twisting their divine abilities into dark reflections of their former selves. Their healing touch becomes a corrupting grasp, their holy smite transforms into necrotic destruction, and their protective auras warp into fields of despair and weakness. Oathbreakers are feared throughout the world, not only for their formidable combat abilities but for their capacity to corrupt and desecrate that which others hold sacred. Many become leaders of dark cults or unholy armies, while others operate alone, spreading corruption wherever they go. Some seek to corrupt other paladins, finding particular satisfaction in turning the righteous to darkness. The path of the Oathbreaker offers tremendous power, but at the cost of being reviled by former allies and hunted by those who still uphold the oaths they have abandoned.
